Basically anything that adds an extra AP ratio onto his kit does a lot of damage because he ends up with so much AP that even a .2 ratio does respectable damage. The issue is that he doesn't really need more damage in his kit, especially not damage that puts him in harm's way (AA range). If you want better DPS with him just build CDR because it will increase the uptime of his abilities and give him more uses of his stun in a fight.
